skillDesc: Proficient in C++, C#, GDScript, and Java, with a focus on designing and implementing scalable game features. Can work fast and efficient.
Usually modeled game assets myself for my personal 3D game projects. Mainly use Blender as the software of choice.
skillPageContent: 3D Art involves using software like Blender and Maya to create models for games, movies, and other visual media.

skillDesc: If you can design it, I can implement it. Have worked with some UI designers to implement UI in video game.
Have experience in designing levels for different types of game. From 3D first person horror, to 2D roguelike with procedurally generated dungeons
